scenario.name: Basic UAC
scenario.send: INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 CSeq: 1 INVITE Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] 192.168.20.250:[local_port];branch=[branch];rport User-Agent: SIPp/v.3.7.1 From: <sip:[tel]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Contact: sip:[tel]@192.168.20.250:[local_port] Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,BYE,CANCEL,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,REFER,MESSAGE,INFO Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len] Max-Forwards: 70 v=0 o=- 1690247308 1 IN IP4 192.168.20.250 s=SIPp/v.3.7.1 c=IN IP4 192.168.20.250 t=0 0 m=audio 5004 RTP/AVP 0 8 101 a=sendrecv a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000/1 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-16,32,36 a=maxptime:240

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] 192.168.20.250:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[tel]@192.168.20.250:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:[tel]@192.168.20.250:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[tel]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [service] <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:[tel]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
